select tc.id, tc.name, tc.course_amount, tc.price, tc.description, tc.status, tc.create_time, tc.cover, tut.name teacher_name, tuc.name create_user from course tc left join user tut on tc.teacher_id = tut.id left join user tuc on tc.create_user = tuc.id where tc.status != -1
and tc.name like '%'#{name}'%'
order by id desc
